title: Lag and disconnects
body:
Hello Everyone,

Your posts are not going un-noticed and we are looking into the connectivity issues that have been reported here. So far, we have not found anything that stands out, but continuing to search.

I will update this thread as soon as we have more to share and apologies on any issues impacting your play.

Best,
Riot Cochese


___________________

25/1 - I am updating to responses in this thread, please read down and post if you have issues related to this post. Thank you.

replies.body:
So in 22 hours none of the team have found anything wrong.

GG WP

Apologies on missing an update here, we did find a few configuration issues that we feel would improve connectivity. We made these changes on Friday morning, and off peak Friday night. 

So far, I have seen a considerable drop off in reports from players experiencing these issues and still working on individual cases at this point, to help understand why some players just have a hard time connecting to our game servers.
Well, that's good. Thank you, based Cochese.
Completely unplayable for me. Massive strange lag spikes and constant "Attempting to Reconnect" messages. Never had any issues until the last week.

What ISP are you currently using? Can you run our network diagnostics test and send results to riottoxichawk@riotgames.com: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/tools/network-logs

In the subject please type your summoner name and reference this thread.

When I'm lucky, these lags disappear suddenly after a couple of minutes or they stay the hole game.
